name: El Hombre Que Susurraba A Las Balas
overview: The Dalton brothers have stolen all the gold from the bank, and in their flight they have lost 24 of them. Although they have been stopped by your assistants, it is your responsibility to find the lost gold. The sun sets, the night will be your companion on the road that leads to Western City, the village next to the great mine where the bandits had fled. It will be difficult to find the gold and recover it, since the inhabitants of the area will not be willing to lose such a precious gift. While your assistants watch the Daltons you find yourself alone in the search ...
